name: Video game-Obsolete Zoo
description:
Obsolete zoo, is a first-person adventure puzzle game, which was made with unity, and solo development by myself, As the game designer, it's a game that showcases my practical skill in the unity engine.

  In the game,Players play the role of a tiny mouse abandoned by its owner in a anoumourous zoo. It needs to jump and shoot secretions to unlock puzzles in the scene, and leave the zoo.

Game instruction : Press ctrl to dash, press space jump, the left mouse button to launch secretions, wasd control character forward direction
